name: Thunderstrike - Devout Worshipper
text: If you control a Level 7 or higher "Thunderstrike" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this face-up card on the field and 1 Thunder type monster in your hand; Special Summon two Level 7 "Thunderstrike" monsters from your Deck or GY, and if you do, their effects are negated, and you can only Special Summon Thunder type monsters for the rest of the turn. You can only activate each effect of "Thunderstrike - Devout Worshipper" once per turn.
